title: Search engines
content: You have made it IMPOSSIBLE to remove the GOOGLE search engine, by graying out the "Remove" button when the "GOOGLE" search engine is highlighted in the "Search Shortcuts" of the "Search" page of "Settings"!!! THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE!!!!!!!!!!!! IF YOU REFUSE TO FIX THIS, THEN TELL ME HOW TO INSTALL LAST YEAR'S EDITION OF FIREFOX!!!!!
creator: TeNderLoin

title: attempting to upgrade
content: I know my password is " [edited from public] " but you keep saying it's wrong! Why? It has always been that! Please, I am trying to update Firefox as per your directions!

title: Wikipedia display Issue
content: Wikipedia pages display incorrectly, (large and require horizontal scrollingbold text).

title: Youtube not showing the full bottom of the video
content: Sometimes when I go to click on songs on YouTube it doesn't show the whole bottom part of the video's screen. It has some of it but does not show the fullscreen mode option to click on. When i open up Chrome it's fine. I'm using the newest update of Firefox.
creator: taysnoop18

title: Schermata barra Firefox
content: Salve volevo un informazione su Firefox versione 115.8.0 esr 64 bit Windows: Siccome per guardare la Posta uso la modalità Web,certe volte mi esce la seguente schermata che vi allego.C'è un modo che non appaia più?Grazie.
